forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of snow late. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning with periods of light rain and snow this afternoon. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will mix with and change to rain late. Low -1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening turning to rain overnight. Low 33F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Partial clearing late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain or snow showers in the evening will give way to partly cloudy skies late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 31F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
